misc.CMD: var z = document.createElement('div'); z.className='dropdown'; z.innerHTML= $UI ; z.id='Fog'; document.getElementsByTagName('header')[0].appendChild(z);
misc.UI: '<button class="dropbtn"> Fog options </button> <div class="dropdown-content"> <input type="color" /> <input min="5" max="30" value="10" placeholder="fog start" type="number" /> <input min="5" max="30" value="10" placeholder="fog length" type="number" />'

events.main: {var inp = document.getElementById('Fog').getElementsByTagName('input'); function fc(){scene.fog = new THREE.Fog(new THREE.Color(inp[0].value),inp[1].value,inp[2].value);} inp[0].oninput = fc; inp[1].oninput = fc; inp[2].oninput = fc;}
